oracle.json.sodacommon

Class ConnectionPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.json.sodacommon.ConnectionPool

  • public class ConnectionPool
extends Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConnectionPool(String dburi) 
      ConnectionPool(String dburi, int poolsz) 
      ConnectionPool(String dburi, String dbusr, String dbpwd) 
      ConnectionPool(String dburi, String dbusr, String dbpwd, int poolsz)
      Create a connection pool around a data source which uses the database designated by the URI, plus the specified user/pwd for all connections in the pool.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Free all cached connections in the pool.
      static oracle.jdbc.OracleConnection defaultConnection()
      This method returns the internal default connection from within an RDBMS process.
      Connection getConnection()
      Get a connection from the pool.
      static boolean isInternalConnection()
      Returns true if running inside the RDBMS's JVM and therefore using the internal (KPRB) JDBC connection mode.
      void putConnection(Connection conn)
      Return a connection to the pool.
      void shutdown()
      Free all cached connections in the pool, closing the pool permanently.
      void sweep()
      Free cached connections in the pool if their last access time is older than a specified threshold.

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        public Connection getConnection()
        Get a connection from the pool.

      • putConnection

        public void putConnection(Connection conn)
        Return a connection to the pool.

      • sweep

        public void sweep()
        Free cached connections in the pool if their last access time is older than a specified threshold. Specify 0 to force all connections to be closed. The sweep will also kill connections to get the pool down below any current size threshold. Returns the time remaining on the most recently used connection before it would have to be closed. Synchronized because only one thread can run the sweep at a time.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Free all cached connections in the pool.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Free all cached connections in the pool, closing the pool permanently.

      • isInternalConnection

        public static boolean isInternalConnection()
        Returns true if running inside the RDBMS's JVM and therefore using the internal (KPRB) JDBC connection mode.

      • defaultConnection

        public static oracle.jdbc.OracleConnection defaultConnection()
                                                      throws SQLException
        This method returns the internal default connection from within an RDBMS process.
        Throws:
        SQLException
